DocTemplateDefinition.Name: Representation Main Context
DocTemplateDefinition.Author: Thomas Liebich
DocTemplateDefinition.Documentation:
Declaration of the main geometric representation context for either 2D or 3D geometric representations.
A **model view definitio**n shall clearly define whether none, 2D, 3D or both main geometric representation contexts are required.

DocTemplateDefinition.Name: Representation Sub Context
DocTemplateDefinition.Author: Thomas Liebich
DocTemplateDefinition.Documentation: Declaration of the sub geometric representation context for either the 2D or the 3D main geometric representation context.

DocTemplateDefinition.Name: Representation Sub Context 3D
DocTemplateDefinition.Author: Thomas Liebich
DocTemplateDefinition.Documentation:
Declaration of the sub geometric representation context for the 3D main geometric representation context. The geometric sub contexts shall define a significant and agreed context identifier to group the different shape representations of the elements included in the project.
A **model view definitio**n shall clearly define the context identifiers and target view enumerators that are permissible.
